docs.text: Welcome to PolliTicket Docs ⚡️ PollTicket will make your support on the Discord server more efficient, let users create tickets to ensure better support 💙 We have a discord server for support 👌 Use our panel as our discord member ⭐ Get premium on our panel, if you vote for us on top.gg Quick link list F.A.Q What is QuickSetup? Information for /Setup Commands Admin /Setup - Create a new setup. /QuickSetup - Quickly create a new setup. /Feedback - Send us some feedback. /Close - Close a ticket. User /Help - Get a link to our docs. /Vote - Get a link to our vote page.
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: ⚡️ PollTicket will make your support on the Discord server more efficient, let users create tickets to ensure better support 💙 We have a discord server for support 👌 Use our panel as our discord member ⭐ Get premium on our panel, if you vote for us on top.gg

docs.title: Quick link list

docs.text: /Setup - Create a new setup. /QuickSetup - Quickly create a new setup. /Feedback - Send us some feedback. /Close - Close a ticket.
docs.title: Admin

docs.text: /Help - Get a link to our docs. /Vote - Get a link to our vote page.
docs.title: User

docs.text: Invite the bot Choose an option to invite the bot Direct invite click here With the button on the profile of the bot (You have to be on a server where the bot is on) Required permissions Please leave the permissions as they are, because PolliTicket only requests the permissions that are needed.
docs.title: Invite

docs.text: Direct invite click here With the button on the profile of the bot (You have to be on a server where the bot is on)
docs.title: Choose an option to invite the bot

docs.text: Please leave the permissions as they are, because PolliTicket only requests the permissions that are needed.
docs.title: Required permissions
